title: Wall Street Breakfast December 3rd: Trade Ceasefire Boosts Investor Sentiment
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Stock markets around the world are in rally mode; Canada's largest oil producing province has ordered an unprecedented output cut, and China has agreed to reduce and remove tariffs on cars coming into China from the U.S. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
